data.title: Full Utility C Site Execute + Post Plant Site Hold
data.description: This is a straightforward, and very effective full utility C Site Execute + post plant Site hold. Only place the Turret after your team has taken a considerable amount of control of C Main.

data.title: Aggressive Early Round C Main Turret + Full Utility Post Plant
data.description: Use this turret early in the round to attempt to take space in C Main, if your team successfully takes control of C, then use the rest of this setup in the post plant.

data.title: A Execute Turret + Alarm Bot
data.description: Use this Turret + Alarm Bot setup when pushing onto A with your team.

data.title: B Main Lurk Turret Setup when Team is Pushing A
data.description: Use this Turret when your team is pushing toward A, if you want to lurk into B Main.
